name: Zenith Eckard Motorized F/D Table
descr:
Basic price - no optional added.

Specifications: 175-225x60x55-75cm.

Stationary table designed and made by Dr. Leander J. Eckard.

Optional: Standard Cervical Drop, Dual Cervical Drop, Standard Thoracic Drop, Two-Step Thoracic Drop, Standard Pelvic Drop, Two-Step Pelvic Drop, Scoliosis Brackets, Leather Upholstery, Rilex Style Upholstery, Heritage Upholstery, Colour Coordinated Base and EU Voltage.
